but how do i start it so i can login via VNC
you install a VNC server on the server, ssh into the server then start a VNC session from there. Finally you connect to the server via a VNC client.
i did apt-get install vnc-common tightvnc
if you want to start a VNC session with ssh, you should install vncserver instead. tightvnc VNC session will only be available when a GNOME session is running.
